segments.text: Hello ! How do I restock my minibar ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you want the whole minibar , or just certain items ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Send me up three bottles each of Perrier and Jim Beam .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's three Jim Beams and three Perriers . Anything else , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The apples in my room were delicious . Bring me a few more , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . Are you sure there isn't anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know , some grape juice would be really nice , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Be patient for just a few minutes , sir , and someone will be at your door .
segments.speaker: S2
